name: arx-map-blob-absorb
description: An Arx Fatalis map where you control a blob that grows by consuming smaller blobs upon collision

scripts.dev: npm run generate && npm run rungame
scripts.dev:noclip: npm run generate && npm run rungame:noclip
scripts.prod: export mode="production" && npm run generate && npm run rungame
scripts.release: export uncompressedFTS="false" && export outputDir="./output" && export mode="production" && rm -rf cache && rm -rf output && npm run generate

author: Lajos Mészáros <m_lajos@hotmail.com>
